title: hgncom
author: hgncom
content: Hello BitcoinTalk Community,I'm excited to present a remarkable opportunity: the domain **H G N . C O M** is up for grabs, and it's a true gem. It's the perfect abbreviation for your crypto startup, instantly lending credibility to your brand.**Starting Bid**: 4 BTC**Bidding Increments**: 1 BTC---**Auction Notes**:The auction will conclude 72 hours after the first qualifying bid of 4 BTC is placed.Standard sniping rules apply: Any bid within the last 10 minutes extends the auction by an additional 10 minutes.
